## Loading and preprocessing the data

get.data <- function (){
  if (!file.exists("data1")) {
    message("Creating Data folder in working directory")
    dir.create("data1")
  }
  
  if(!file.exists("data/repdata-data-activity")) {
    fileURL <- "http://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip"
    download.file(fileURL, destfile = "./data1/repdata-data-activity.zip")
    file.name <- "./data1/repdata-data-activity.zip"
    unzip(file.name, exdir = "data1")
    unlink(file.name)
  }
  else message("data already exists")
}
get.data()
activity <- read.csv("./data1/activity.csv", colClasses = c("numeric", "Date", "numeric"))
activity$day <- weekdays(activity$date)
